column4: want to copy some directories into the /usr directory, but I dont have the rights for it. thought sudo cp.. might work, but it didnt... anyone able to tell me how I can copy those directories into /usr?
removing ubuntu-desktop is no big deal, it's a metapackage, and that's expected.
however, removing firefox will cause some documentation stuff to have problems (that's the ubuntu-doc bit), so you might want to just add opera, and leave firefox
